VIEW_SOURCE: CREATE ALGORITHM=UNDEFINED DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` SQL SECURITY DEFINER VIEW `v1_spp_penerimaan_barang` AS select `ts`.`Id` AS `Id`,`ts`.`c1` AS `c1`,`ts`.`c` AS `c`,`ts`.`d` AS `d`,`ts`.`e` AS `e`,`ts`.`e1` AS `e1`,`ts`.`e2` AS `e2`,`ts`.`e3` AS `e3`,`ts`.`refid_terima` AS `refid_terima`,`ts`.`jns_spp` AS `jns_spp`,`ts`.`bk` AS `bk`,`ts`.`ck` AS `ck`,`ts`.`dk` AS `dk`,`ts`.`p` AS `p`,`ts`.`q` AS `q`,`ts`.`tgl_dok_kontrak` AS `tgl_dok_kontrak`,`ts`.`no_dok_kontrak` AS `no_dok_kontrak`,`ts`.`penyedia_barang` AS `penyedia_barang`,`ts`.`refid_penyedia` AS `refid_penyedia`,`ts`.`no_spd` AS `no_spd`,`ts`.`tgl_spd` AS `tgl_spd`,`ts`.`tgl_spp` AS `tgl_spp`,`ts`.`nomor_spp` AS `nomor_spp`,`ts`.`refid_pa_kpa` AS `refid_pa_kpa`,`ts`.`refid_pejabat_pk` AS `refid_pejabat_pk`,`ts`.`refid_pptk` AS `refid_pptk`,`ts`.`refid_bendahara_pp` AS `refid_bendahara_pp`,`ts`.`uraian` AS `uraian`,`ts`.`sttemp` AS `sttemp`,`ts`.`tgl_create` AS `tgl_create`,`ts`.`tgl_update` AS `tgl_update`,`ts`.`uid_spp` AS `uid_spp`,`ts`.`status` AS `status`,`ts`.`tgl_spm` AS `tgl_spm`,`ts`.`nomor_spm` AS `nomor_spm`,`ts`.`uid_spm` AS `uid_spm`,`ts`.`refid_bendahara_p` AS `refid_bendahara_p`,`ts`.`tgl_sp2d` AS `tgl_sp2d`,`ts`.`nomor_sp2d` AS `no_sp2d`,`ts`.`refid_bendahara_umum` AS `refid_bendahara_umum`,`ts`.`rekening_kas_daerah` AS `rekening_kas_daerah`,`ts`.`status_spm` AS `status_spm`,`ts`.`uid_sp2d` AS `uid_sp2d`,`ts`.`uid_create` AS `uid_create`,`tpb`.`id_penerimaan` AS `id_penerimaan` from (`t_spp` `ts` left join `t_penerimaan_barang` `tpb` on((`ts`.`refid_terima` = `tpb`.`Id`)))
